title: Unmasked
description: Laney Holden is always blindfolded during her encounters with Alex, but not knowing what he looks like doesn’t discourage her from seeing him. She loves what she’s found in room 237… until a slip on his part gives away that she knows him outside of The Club. She becomes obsessed with learning his identity and must decide whether it matters enough to potentially destroy what they have.As her list of suspects grows, her investigation into Alex takes her down roads she did not imagine, leading her to the one man she secretly hopes he is. Could he be her mysterious lover in room 237? Or is Alex someone entirely different, someone she never suspected?Unmasked is the third and final novella in the Room 237 Series.
author: Emma  Payne
